newsitem.title: USA: Hondo Oil says suspends Colombia well tests.
newsitem.headline: Hondo Oil says suspends Colombia well tests.

text.p: Honda Oil & Gas Co said Wednesday it suspended the testing and completion of its Opon No. 6 well in Colombia to analyze data after a second completion attempt was made following a mechanical failure of the perforating guns.
It appeared some of the new perforations were blocked, a company statement said. Honda expects the analysis to take about three months, it added.
